description: Try our easy to follow Noodle Omelettes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Omelette,Prawn,Tree nut free,Egg,Quick & easy lunch,Dairy free
name: Noodle Omelettes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cup broccoli, stems trimmed, cut into small florets
1 small red capsicum, deseeded, finely sliced
2 cm piece fresh ginger, peeled, finely grated
2 spring onions, green tops only, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place noodles and broccoli in a heatproof bowl and cover with boiling water. Stand for 5 minutes or until softened. Drain well. Whisk eggs and onion in a separate bowl.

Heat 2 tsp garlic-infused oil in a wok or frying pan over medium-high heat. Add prawn and ginger, and stir-fry for 1 minute. Add capsicum and beans and stir-fry for 2 minutes or until just tender. Transfer to a bowl. Add noodles, broccoli and sesame oil, and toss to combine.
Heat 1 tsp remaining garlic-infused oil in a wok or frying pan over medium heat. Add a quarter of the egg mixture and swirl to spread. Cook for 30 seconds or until just set.

Top half the omelette with a quarter each of the noodle mixture and bean sprouts. Cook for 1 minute or until egg has set. Fold omelette over to enclose filling. Slide onto a plate and cover to keep warm. Repeat to make 3 more omelettes. Drizzle with soy sauce and serve.
